childEntities.name: Advantage Online Store Database
childEntities.description: Create a database that will hold the online store information. This information will include data as described in this requirement

childEntities.name: Accounts
childEntities.description: The database should store account information that will allow us to manage the individual accounts of our customers the account details that should be stored are as follows

childEntities.name: Personal account details
childEntities.description:
New accounts details include:

  • The user first and last name
  • An e-mail address that should also be used as a login name
  • A hashed password that should be salted and peppered to provide maximum protection.
  • Home Telephone number
  • Mobile telephone number
  • work telephone number
